rules.comment: This example shows how to create a permission that can be used to grant administrative access to records of the record type 'PII' in the 'SaaS-Applications' workspace with the condition that the request originate from France or Germany. In this case, this permission is allowing the user dtijerina-PIIAdmin@privcloud.com or the application app-integration-PIIAdmin these privileges. Once this permissions is created, it needs to be assigned to a role and then the role granted to dtijerina-PIIAdmin@privcloud.com or the application app-integration-PIIAdmin.
